languages.text: "Гибель "Йесевона" — ужасная утрата. Миллионы паломников сгинули во мраке ереси, унеся с собой искру Его".
"The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."
languages.original_text: "Гибель "Йесевона" — ужасная утрата. Миллионы паломников сгинули во мраке ереси, унеся с собой искру Его".

traits.locale_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “杰西文的陨落是个巨大的损失，几百万的朝圣者在异端的黑暗中丧命，帝皇的火焰也随之熄灭。”
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: “杰西文的陨落是个巨大的损失，几百万的朝圣者在异端的黑暗中丧命，帝皇的火焰也随之熄灭。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La déchéance de Jesevon est une terrible perte. Des millions de pèlerins ont péri dans les ténèbres de l'hérésie, emportant Son étincelle avec eux. »
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: « La déchéance de Jesevon est une terrible perte. Des millions de pèlerins ont péri dans les ténèbres de l'hérésie, emportant Son étincelle avec eux. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La destrucción de Jesevon es una pérdida terrible. Millones de peregrinos murieron en la oscuridad de la herejía, llevándose la luz del Emperador con ellos».
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: «La destrucción de Jesevon es una pérdida terrible. Millones de peregrinos murieron en la oscuridad de la herejía, llevándose la luz del Emperador con ellos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ジェセボンの滅びは大きな損失だ。何百万もの巡礼者が異端の闇の中で死に、皇帝が授けた天啓ごと失われてしまった」
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェセボンの滅びは大きな損失だ。何百万もの巡礼者が異端の闇の中で死に、皇帝が授けた天啓ごと失われてしまった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Niedergang von Jesevon ist ein schrecklicher Verlust. Millionen von Pilgern sind in der Dunkelheit der Ketzerei verendet und haben seinen Funken mit sich genommen."
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: "Der Niedergang von Jesevon ist ein schrecklicher Verlust. Millionen von Pilgern sind in der Dunkelheit der Ketzerei verendet und haben seinen Funken mit sich genommen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

languages.text: "Jesevon'un yitirilişi, korkunç bir kayıp oldu. Milyonlarca hacı, kâfirliğin karanlığında helak oldu; O'nun kıvılcımı da onlarla birlikte sönüp gitti."
languages.original_text: "The demise of Jesevon is a terrible loss. Millions of pilgrims have perished in the darkness of heresy, taking His spark with them."

traits.locale_text: "Jesevon'un yitirilişi, korkunç bir kayıp oldu. Milyonlarca hacı, kâfirliğin karanlığında helak oldu; O'nun kıvılcımı da onlarla birlikte sönüp gitti."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
